author: Daniel Greene
description:
🔥 This week’s Fantasy News is HUGE! From Meta’s Book Heist Update and the Hugo Awards 2025 to exciting cover reveals from some of the most anticipated fantasy and sci-fi releases, NaNoWriMo shutdown, expanse kickstarter, and we’ve also got updates on Murderbot, Avatar: The Last Airbender, Death Stranding, and more!
